sentence: The PowerShares Dynamic Building & Construction Portfolio ETF ( PKB ) is seeing unusually high volume in afternoon trading Friday, with over 192,000 shares traded versus three month average volume of about 60,000.
Shares of PKB were up about 1.2% on the day.

Components of that ETF with the highest volume on Friday were Home Depot ( HD ), trading up about 1.4% with over 5.5 million shares changing hands so far this session, and Louisiana Pacific ( LPX ), up about 0.7% on volume of over 2.4 million shares.

US Concrete ( USCR ) is the component faring the best Friday, higher by about 4% on the day, while KBR ( KBR ) is lagging other components of the PowerShares Dynamic Building & Construction Portfolio ETF, trading lower by about 3.2%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
